resources.string:
Communication stability test.
 Client every 100ms send message to server. 
 Server show the received data, then send the received data return to clients.
 Clients show the received data from server.

his application is used for communication speed test. 
 Operation steps:
 1. One choose SERVER and others choose CLIENT. After choose, it will turn to speed test activity.
 2. Server input test speed and click Start button, Client click Start button. If everything is OK, the speed is shown
